attributes.action: end the Maritime Admiralty deception commited by the Corporation of UNITED KINGDOM, and make it known to the human beings living in the United Kingdom that they can abolish or amend their contract with the government of said Corporation, keep their Common Law Rights, and become Freemen-on-the-land.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Statute Law system is a deception.  It is a legal, business contract you have with the Corporation of UNITED KINGDOM and you may accept or DECLINE the OFFER of a police officer, Judge or magistrate to give said statute the force of Law.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
